recipe.title_food: Find the perfect food recipe for you

about.description: At YummyFit, we believe that eating healthy should be easy and enjoyable. That’s why we’ve built a platform that combines smart technology with thousands of delicious, nutritious recipes — all conveniently in one place.

offer1.title: Personalized Meal Planning:
offer1.desc: Tailor-made meal plans based on your health goals, dietary preferences, allergies, and fitness level.

offer2.title: Smart Recipe Search:
offer2.desc: Discover healthy recipes using ingredients you already have.

offer3.title: Nutrition Tracking:
offer3.desc: Keep track of calories, macronutrients, and daily goals with our easy-to-use dashboard.

contact.title: Have Questions About Your Journey? Reach Out!

contact.subject: Subject
contact.success: Thank you for reaching out! We will get back to you soon.

contact.footer: Need help with your diet journey? Want to know more about healthy recipes or tracking your progress? Send us your questions, suggestions, or feedback. We're excited to hear from you!
contact.cta: Start your healthy lifestyle today — sign up now!

keto.label: Keto
keto.excludes: High-carb grains, Sugars, Starches, Most fruits
